title: Unboxing Video
description: XMAILBOX mailbox comes with a TYPE-C power cable and a network cable.

networkConfig.title: Network Configuration
networkConfig.description: XMAILBOX mailbox factory default IP address is 192.168.6.250

domainEmail.title: Domain & Mailbox
domainEmail.description: XMAILBOX mailbox management interface URL default is https://192.168.6.250/admin/

pcClient.title: Configure PC Mail Client
pcClient.description: XMAILBOX mailbox supports PC mail clients. Please refer to the video tutorial to set up your PC mail client.

mobileClient.title: Configure Mobile Mail Client
mobileClient.description: XMAILBOX mailbox supports mobile mail clients. Please refer to the video tutorial to set up your mobile mail client.

fileSharing.title: WINDOWS File Sharing
fileSharing.description: XMAILBOX mailbox has file sharing function. Please refer to the video.

reset.title: Reset Mailbox
reset.description: If you forgot the box's IP address or forgot the administrator username and password you set, please refer to this video to reset.
